description.english: Earn all gold medals in the tutorial
description.russian: Получите все золотые медали в учебнике
description.brazilian: Conquiste todas as medalhas de ouro no tutorial
description.schinese: 在教程中获得所有金牌
description.spanish: Consigue todas las medallas de oro en el tutorial

description.english: Earn all gold medals for the 6 spellcaster training missions
description.german: Verdiene alle Goldmedaillen in den 6 Zauberer-Trainingsmissionen
description.russian: Получите все золотые медали за 6 тренировочных миссий заклинателей
description.brazilian: Conquiste todas as medalhas de ouro nas 6 missões de treinamento de conjuradores
description.schinese: 在6个巫师训练任务中获得所有金牌
description.spanish: Consigue todas las medallas de oro en las 6 misiones de entrenamiento de lanzadores de hechizos

description.english: Insult the Old Wise Man in the tutorial.
description.german: Beleidige den alten Weisen im Tutorial.
description.brazilian: Insulte o Velho Sábio no tutorial.
description.spanish: Insulta al Viejo Sabio en el tutorial.

description.english: Store sapphires, diamonds and gold in depots
description.german: Lagere Saphire, Diamanten und Gold in Depots
description.russian: Соберите сапфиры, алмазы и золото на складах
description.brazilian: Armazene safiras, diamantes e ouro nos depósitos
description.schinese: 在仓库中储存蓝宝石、钻石和黄金
description.spanish: Almacena zafiros, diamantes y oro en los depósitos

description.english: Win a mission without having harvesters on the starting ship
description.german: Gewinne eine Mission, ohne Sammler auf dem Startschiff zu haben
description.russian: Выиграйте миссию, не имея сборщиков на стартовом корабле
description.brazilian: Vença uma missão sem ter coletores no navio inicial
description.schinese: 在没有初始船只的收获工情况下完成任务
description.spanish: Gana una misión sin tener recolectores en el barco inicial

description.english: Return a relic within 20 seconds after it spawned in an equilibrium mission
description.german: Bring ein Relikt innerhalb von 20 Sekunden nach seinem Erscheinen in einer Gleichgewichtsmission zurück
description.russian: Верните реликвию в течение 20 секунд после её появления в миссии равновесия
description.brazilian: Devolva uma relíquia dentro de 20 segundos após ela aparecer em uma missão de equilíbrio
description.schinese: 在平衡任务中，遗物生成后20秒内将其归还
description.spanish: Devuelve una reliquia en menos de 20 segundos después de que aparezca en una misión de equilibrio

description.english: Have a village with 15 army units in a liberation mission
description.german: Hab ein Dorf mit 15 Armeeeinheiten in einer Befreiungsmission
description.russian: Иметь деревню с 15 боевыми единицами в миссии освобождения
description.brazilian: Tenha uma aldeia com 15 unidades do exército em uma missão de libertação
description.schinese: 在解放任务中的村庄拥有15个军队单位
description.spanish: Ten una aldea con 15 unidades de ejército en una misión de liberación

description.brazilian: Destrua a base principal do inimigo
description.spanish: Destruye la base principal del enemigo

description.russian: Убейте 10 врагов одновременно с помощью прицельного выстрела
description.brazilian: Mate 10 inimigos simultaneamente com um disparo preciso
description.schinese: 用狙击同时击杀10名敌人
description.spanish: Mata a 10 enemigos simultáneamente con un disparo preciso

description.english: Use snipe in combination with incite
description.german: Nutze Präzisionsschuss in Kombination mit Anstacheln
description.russian: Используйте прицельный выстрел в сочетании с подстреканием
description.brazilian: Use um disparo preciso em combinação com incitação
description.spanish: Usa un disparo preciso en combinación con incitar

displayName.spanish: De vuelta de las Tierras Baldías

description.english: Fight a Legendary Creature with your own Legendary Creature
description.german: Kämpfe mit deiner eigenen legendären Kreatur gegen eine andere legendäre Kreatur
description.russian: Сразитесь с Легендарным существом своей собственной Легендарной сущностью
description.brazilian: Lute contra uma Criatura Lendária com sua própria Criatura Lendária
description.schinese: 用你自己的传说生物对抗传说生物
description.spanish: Lucha contra una Criatura Legendaria con tu propia Criatura Legendaria

description.english: Win a mission where the only units arriving by ship are Travois
description.german: Gewinne eine Mission, bei der die einzigen Einheiten, die per Schiff ankommen, Travois sind
description.russian: Выиграйте миссию, где единственными прибывающими по кораблю юнитами являются Травуа
description.brazilian: Vença uma missão em que as únicas unidades vindas pelo navio sejam Travois
description.schinese: 船运的单位仅用橇完成一场任务
description.spanish: Gana una misión en la que las únicas unidades que llegan por barco sean Travois

description.english: Have 5 Spirit Bears at the same time
description.brazilian: Tenha 5 Ursos Espirituais ao mesmo tempo
description.spanish: Ten 5 Osos Espirituales al mismo tiempo
